BasicInformation.Title: MicroTouch™ Tough Blade
BasicInformation.Description:
The MicroTouch™ Tough Blade features a German engineered precision blade system -- the first blade lifts, the second cuts and the third finishes. This intuitive design makes shaving or trimming a breeze and ensures clean, precise results every time. 

 

 

  • 3 stainless steel blades 
  • Microthin non-stick coating on blades
  • Shaves at any angle 
  • Great for sensitive skin
  • Includes 12 refill cartridges for one full year of shaving 
  • Imported
